name: Renamed
description:
Easily rename and transform the layer name case.


Works with current page or selected layers.


❖ Transform case to

Switch the layer name case to one of the following case types.


Title Case

layer name → Layer Name


Sentence case

layer name → Layer name


Header-Case

layer name → Layer-Name


PascalCase

layer name → LayerName


camelCase

layer name → layerName


lowercase

LAYER NAME → layer name


UPPERCASE

layer name → LAYER NAME


CONSTANT_CASE

layer name → LAYER_NAME


snake_case

layer name → layer_name


param-case

layer name → layer-name


path/case

layer name → layer/name


dot.case

layer name → layer.name


no case

layerName → layer name



❖ Find & rename

Change the particular name of layer(s).
